metadata.name: I’m free
metadata.description:
Silence is my captivity.
I’m free.
Amita-fo.
Throwing the cross over my shoulders,
Oh, Golgotha, you’re far.
How to preserve love in a place like this?
Where do I get the wisdom, the humility?
In the starry quiet of the skies
To drown my doubts.
To cast aside the evil of me,
To choke my pride.
No sign of desperation,
Not leaving after taking the wrong step.
Not to leave the path of Good
When summoning the powers of the Light.
You measure trials, give them out by power.
I do believe it!
And hope that after drinking
My own cup of bitter torture
I’ll throw my hands up to the sky
In gratitude.
And my soul shall see the joy of serene light.
I thank You
for Love, for pain, for this.

1 / 1 

Resolution 3790 x 3790
